Properties

id

id: string
  • Defined in models/HomeSection/index.ts:23

An internal identifier of this HomeSection

Optional items

items: MangaTile[]
  • Defined in models/HomeSection/index.ts:35

A list of MangaTile objects which should be shown under this section

title

title: string
  • Defined in models/HomeSection/index.ts:30

The title of this section. Common examples of HomeSection titles would be 'Latest Manga', 'Updated Manga', 'Hot Manga', etc.

Optional view_more

view_more: Request
  • Defined in models/HomeSection/index.ts:44

Should you be able to scroll, and view more manga on this section? This method, when true, triggers the {@link Source.getViewMoreRequest} method when the user tries to scroll further on the HomePage section. This usually means that it will traverse to another page, and render more information
